name: BOSCH DSB5012 12-Piece Assorted Set Daredevil Spade Bits, 1/4 in. Hex Shank Ideal for Fast Drilling Applications in Wood
short_description: Speed drilling – designed to deliver the fastest drilling performance possible through wood for a spade bit, up to 10X faster than conventional spade bits, but with clean hole entry and angled cutting edges for reduced blowout
Full-thread tip – delivers outstanding speed through 2x4s by pulling the bit through the wood
Contoured paddle design – improves speed with faster chip removal
Spur-and-reamer tips – provides cleaner holes by clearing chips faster
Hex shank – improves bit grip and allows use with a variety of drill types
Full-cone design – pulls the bit through material
Premium bit material – combined with innovation for great performance and life
product_description: Bosch Daredevil spade bits deliver the fastest drilling performance possible through wood, up to 10X faster than conventional spade bits. The bit as a full-cone threaded tip that pulls it through the wood, offering best-in-class speed through 2x4s. Ideal for clean-boring a lot of holes through wood fast to run conduit or pipe, these bits deliver a drilling speed and a force performance that sets them apart; these are not bits for counter sinking or Dowling. The spur-and-reamer feature on each Daredevil spade bit clears chips better, for a cleaner hole. The hex shank with power groove reduces bit slippage in the drill and makes it suitable for use with a variety of drill types, including impact drills. Do not use in drill press.

name: 6Pcs 12" Wood Auger Drill bit Set，1/4"-7/8" Hex Shank Auger Drill bit Wood for Soft and Hard Wood,Drywall,Plastic and Composite Materials
short_description: Material Features:This drill is made of solid carbon steel, and the chip evacuation groove is hollow design for smooth chip evacuation.
Dimensions Accessories:Drill diameters of 1/4“, 3/8”, 1/2“, 5/8”, 3/4“, 7/8” lengths of 12“ Maximum working hole depth of 8.5inch”, and tool kit.
Design Benefits:The screw tip ensures that locating holes are drilled in wood, plastic and a variety of other materials. The screw tip contributes to a safer and smoother start.
Application Scenario:This drill can drill holes in softwood, hardwood, MDF, plywood, lumber, railroad ties, landscape timbers and other materials.

Safe Operation:Please set the lowest speed to start drilling operation and put safety first. For best drilling results, use a high-powered drill, corded drill or bench drill for drilling. Please remember to check the drill before each use to make sure it is in the best condition.

name: 13PCS HSS Brad Point Wood Drill Bits Set for Carpenter Woodworking, 1/4" Hex Shank Black Gold for Hardwood, Plywood, Plastic 1/8"-1/2"
short_description: Package and Most Frequently Used Sizes: 1/8"(x2), 5/32"(x2), 11/64", 3/16"(x2), 7/32",1/4"(x2), 5/16", 3/8", 1/2". All drill bits are kept in a strong and professional plastic case with indexed holder which is convenient for storage and pick-up

Brad Point: Brad point tip provides precision accuracy for starting your drilling hole. The wood drill bit set can help you immerse yourself in natural forests such as pine, maple, cedar, oak, ash trees and other all types of engineering wood

Smooth Surface: Fully ground smooth drill bit body for less effort and higher accuracy. Black gold coating for higher wear resistance, ability to withstand higher temperatures, and increased durability

Perfect for All Types of Wood: These specially engineered drill bits are specifically made to reduce chipping and splintering. Easily drill into natural woods like pine, maple, cedar, oak, ash, and more. These also work on all types of engineered woods

Quick Change Solid Hex Shank: 1/4"(6.35mm) hex shank fits into standard power tools and impact drivers. VALYRIANTOOL Hex drill bit's solid bonding technology eliminates radial runout and improves concentricity. High torque, impact-rated accuracy

name: DEWALT Drill Bit Set, Brad Point, 6-Piece (DW1720) , Black
short_description: Precise cutting edges of the drill bits for wood or metal are designed to reduce splintering
Brad point tip of drill bits reduces walking
DEWALT drill bit set is engineered flutes for clean effective chip removal
Country of Origin: China
product_description: With precise cutting edges to helps to reduce splintering and a brad point tip to decrease walking, the DEWALT drill bits sets features commonly used bits to power through wood with ease. The drill bits sets are engineered flutes provide effective chip removal. A high-speed steel construction delivers extreme durability.

name: 13 Piece Spade Drill Bit Set, Paddle Flat Bit for Woodworking, Hole Cutter Wood Drill Bit Set with Quick Change Shank, 1/4" to 1-1/2", Nylon Storage Pouch Included
short_description: HIGH-QUALITY: Constructed from high-carbon steel with heat treatment for durability and hardness, the head with a polished surface ensures longevity. The flat paddle design features a sharp cutting edge to ensure the hole is smooth and clean.

DRILL BIT SET INCLUDE: 13 Pcs high-quality spade drill bits including 1/4", 5/16", 3/8", 1/2", 9/16", 5/8", 3/4", 7/8", 1", 1-1/8", 1-1/4", 1-3/8", 1-1/2" to meet all your needs. Come with a nylon storage pouch that can be easy to access and store.

QUICK-CHANGE SHANK: 1/4 inch hex shank with groove for reducing slipping and preventing falling off, safety. Universal for the most drill driver tool of brands in the markets, easily and securely, especially for locking into quick change chuck.

FEATURE: The flat paddle with double-side cutting spurs of high quality for sharper and faster drilling speed & smoother chip removal. Accurate drilling on Wood, Fiberglass, Plastic, PVC (Polyvinyl Chloride), and soft metals such as aluminum.
Quality Commitment: If for any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, please contact us. We provide a 30-day money back.

name: DEWALT Titanium Nitride Coated Drill Bit Set, Pilot Point, 21-Piece (DW1361)
short_description: Titanium Nitride Coating Pilot Point for Longer Life
Starts on contact for cleaner holes
No spin shanks
Tapered web provides greater durability to reduce breaking
Includes sizes from 1/16-inch to 1/2-inch in a plastic tough case
product_description: Featuring heavy-duty titanium nitride coating PILOT POINTs that start on contact and helps to prevent walking, the DEWALT includes commonly used bits for a range of metal and wood-drilling applications. No-spin shanks helps to prevent bits from slipping, and a tapered web delivers helps to increased durability to helps to reduce breakage. A durable carrying case keeps bits organized and ready to go.

name: 6Pcs 12-Inch Long Auger Drill Bit Set for Wood, 1/4"-7/8" Inch Hex Shank Ship Auger Drill Bit for Soft and Hard Wood, Plastic, Drywall and Composite Materials
short_description: 🔨【Top Quality】Our Wood Auger Bit is made of top 1045 high Carbon Steel,it has been specially hardened to ensure its durability and long service life.Note: To achieve the best drilling results, please use high-power drill, corded power drill or bench drill for drilling operations.
🔨【6 Sizes for Your Various Needs】Drilling diameter: 1/4", 3/8", 1/2", 5/8", 3/4" and 7/8" Inch,Total length: 12"Inch,Hex Shank: 1/4" & 2/5"Inch.Perfect for drilling into soft and hard wood.
🔨【Unique Self-Positioning Design】The Self Feeding Coarse screw point of auger bits can help the drill bit be accurately and quickly positioned on the wood for easy drilling.

🔨【High Effieiect & Smooth Holes】Our woodworking hex shank drill bit is designed with a single-tooth cutting edge, which cuts the edge first and then drills, making drilling more efficient;The extra-large chip flute design makes chip removal faster and smooth holes can be obtained easily.

🔨【Wide Range of Use】Self-Positioning point tip provides accurate positioning Suitable for drilling into both soft and hard woods, MDF, plywood, lumber, landscape timber, and for installing PVC pipes or boring tree stumps(not for metal).
